entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Richmond - Metcalfe)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:32 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 5:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Dewpoint: -4.6°C
Wind: NNW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
